title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-m - Certification of custody
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-m - Certification of custody

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-m
12/88
CERTIFICATION OF CUSTODY
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, CERTIFICATE
OF CUSTODY
Docket No. ________
Indictment No. ________
-against-
________, Defendant. ________ x
TO: The above named court
TO: District Attorney, ________ County

This is to certify that the above-named
defendant who was committed to my custody or ordered retained in my custody by
(a temporary order of observation) (the last order of retention), dated
________, 19 ________, was in my custody on the expiration date of such
order. Dated: ________
_________
Signature of Director
_________
Printed Name
_________
Facility

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-m

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
